alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Franklin and east central St. Lawrence Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carry Falls Reservoir, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parishville, Colton, Carry Falls Reservoir, Lake Ozonia, Hopkinton, Stark, Higley Flow State Park, South Colton and West Pierrepont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence
